Package org.cleverbus.api.event

Defines CleverBus events.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractAsynchEvent Base class for asynchronous message events.
CompletedMsgAsynchEvent Event for successfully completed message, i.e. the message is in MsgStateEnum.OK state.
EventNotifierBase<T extends EventObject> Base class for implementing Camel event notifiers.
FailedMsgAsynchEvent Event for failed message, i.e. the message is in MsgStateEnum.FAILED state.
PartlyFailedMsgAsynchEvent Event for partly failed message, i.e. the message is in MsgStateEnum.PARTLY_FAILED state.
PostponedMsgAsynchEvent Event for postponed message, i.e. the message is in MsgStateEnum.POSTPONED state.
ProcessingMsgAsynchEvent Event for processing message, i.e. the message is in MsgStateEnum.PROCESSING state.
WaitingMsgAsynchEvent Event for waiting message, i.e. the message is in MsgStateEnum.WAITING state.
 

Annotation Types Summary
EventNotifier Indicates that an annotated class is a Camel {@link org.apache.camel.spi.EventNotifier event notifier class.
 

Package org.cleverbus.api.event Description

Defines CleverBus events.
